website_summaries.verdict: A simple glass-top coffee table that's easy to assemble.
pros: This glass-top table has a minimalist design that will work in any modern-style living room
cons: Legs may be slightly wobbly where they meet the glass surface

customer_reviews.title: Going on 6 years old!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this table for 6 years now and it's still going strong. It's accumulated some scratches on the top through the years, but no rust, not falling apart, still shiny as ever. It's been a good table, and continues to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grapevine, TX

customer_reviews.title: Classy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table!! Looks great in my studio apartment. I was looking for a small table that wouldn’t take up too much space. This one is perfect. Very classy. IKEA ektorp 3 seat sofa for reference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Table, Just Right for Small Apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little table for the money. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Looks a lot more expensive than it is. Just right for my small apartment. I just bought a second one of these tables. With my young son using the first one for various projects over the years, the glass top got a bit scratched. When the scratches got too numerous, I moved the table into my son's room so he can continue using it for his scratchy projects and bought a new one for the living room. So far, no scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Dan_Portland

customer_reviews.title: Simple look and simple assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this glass table is designed with modern simplicity. Clean lines and contemporary chrome legs. The installation was a piece of cake. You simply have to screw the 2 legs on. The table is also lightweight for being glass (which is a good thing in my book). I did read some of the reviews and some customer said that their tables developed white circles where the steel circles meet the glass due to too much pressure. In attempts to prevent this, I did not overtighten any of the screws. I tightened it just right so that the table is stable. All-in-all very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Jen P.

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: I was soooo excited about this table but wasn’t kind of sad once it arrived. Looks like we probably received a return or a damaged product. The metal was very stained, scratched, and dirty. For $80 I would have expected much more. I loved the look of it, just the dirty splotches make the table look very cheap :(
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for what I had in mind. It came and was well packaged, everything was fine. I put it together all by myself in about 15 minutes max (and I'm a 60 yr. old lady). I expected the hub to be less than thrilled since he's kind of a wood lover - but I didn't say a thing and a couple days lady he said "I really like your coffee table you bought." I was shocked -- that's how nice it is. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ra!

customer_reviews.title: Clearly a Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about this one. It was inexpensive and I was afraid it would look cheap and not of quality materials. I have been pleasantly surprised. It is sturdy, and looks amazing! This will last my daughter for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna M

customer_reviews.title: Joint Glue not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I loved this table when it arrived- great looking - great size - but after a year of regular use - the leg separated from the glass at the joint. When the table is moved now, you have to realign the leg joint with the glass to keep the table leg from falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes. The legs are rusty. This isn’t worth $90. Dont waste your time. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nil805

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: Kind of surprised for that price at this table would be that good.. very sturdy, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Santos

customer_reviews.title: It fits in perfectly in our small apartment and looks great. I did notice that white glue is starting ...
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat this table for the price. It fits in perfectly in our small apartment and looks great. I did notice that white glue is starting to show on some of the connecting pieces, so that is something to think about. However, if you are looking for apartment furniture that looks really nice at a cheap price, then I still consider this a bargain. Overall build quality is good and sturdiness is great.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: It's much better than I thought it would be for 80 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Solid!.. I have a hardwood floor and was worried it would have a bit of 'wiggle' or the legs wouldn't be even. No issues. The glass is fairly heavy so it has weight on the legs. It's much better than I thought it would be for 80 bucks. Glass has No chips - looks beautiful. I wish it were a tad bit longer (length).. but no worries. I'm a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: COOK

customer_reviews.title: Small table
customer_reviews.text: This is a small table.. It’s sturdy.. It’s cute in the area .. it was placed
customer_reviews.author: Latrell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT LOVE IT!! This coffee table is perfect in my living room. The glass and chrome give the room an airy and open feel. I purchased the matching side table, and I will probably go back and get a second one of those. The glass on the coffee table is thick and heavy - excellent quality. You won't be disappointed with this one!!
customer_reviews.author: CJSmith

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received an item with missing parts and broken glass. Had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but looks great! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small coffee table that looks great and is an even better buy. I was afraid something this inexpensive wouldn't look that great but it absolutely does. It's easy to put up and only took about 5 minutes. I've seen some complaints about its reliability over a long period but I wll update if I have any issues. So far it looks great and was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RETSmile

customer_reviews.title: Great size table
customer_reviews.text: The table is sleek and modern. However one of the legs came loose from the glass the first week I purchased it. My husband used a clear glue to reattach it. For the price, I'm not surprised or upset. It fits fine in front of my loveseat and blends well with my other very large modern, glass coffee table
customer_reviews.author: K. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great find ... !
customer_reviews.text: I was at first reluctant because of the low price but went ahead with my initial gut instinct to purchase it anyway. Had a much, much more expensive (but way too large) table that this one replaced. It arrived early, without a scratch and I had it set up in less than 5 minutes (which is a miracle as I am a klutz). It is just what I was looking for - perfect size and great quality! All in all ... just a great find! Would buy from Kings Brand again in a heart beat! I was looking at another table from another vendor that was 3 x's the price of this one - so glad I bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a coffee table! Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Great product for a smaller area! We love it
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Just super for nyc cozy condo! Keeps a airy contemporary flow in the room! R-luv
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: but sturdy. the only thing is
customer_reviews.text: very durable and light, but sturdy. the only thing is, it's a little tall for a coffee table. Sort of my fault for not checking the height dimensions and only the width, but otherwise it looks as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: hyelin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when clean
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great when kept clean with Windex. Wonderful price on a modern-looking simple glass table. I would recommend to anyone looking for decent quality, but don't want to spend too much.
customer_reviews.author: New York Photographer

customer_reviews.title: ... received the product it was completely shattered which I'm pretty sure was UPS fault
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the product it was completely shattered which I'm pretty sure was UPS fault. This company replaced this item quickly and made sure I completely satisfied. The coffee table looks great and I get many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a small, unobtrusive table for our den. The table sits on an elaborate area rug and we wanted a glass table that would not obscure the rug. This table totally meets our needs. The chrome legs are almost invisible and the glass top is very sturdy. Exceptionally easy assembly and sturdy when assembled. It is a small-sized table and works perfectly for us in the den. The packing was very sturdy and delivery was very fast (ordered late Thursday evening and table was delivered on Tuesday). An excellent value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mason

customer_reviews.title: decent table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pro: * price is reasonable * glass looks good * stylish * sturdy * easy to setup Con: * the metal part is a little bit cheap, has some dents in the corners Others: I was looking for a table that doesn't take up too much space. THis fit what I'm looking for perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Darren Dao

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic USA Made Glass Top Coffee Table!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table and very pleased. I like the fact it is made in the USA!!! Table was very easy to put together. I wanted a small glass top table for our great room area. This table is perfect....not too bulky and looks classy. Price was great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Sleek & Sturdy Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, simple and does the job! I was a bit worried about purchasing this table. I thought it would "look" cheap in my living room. However, I was pleasantly surprised at how nice looking and sturdy it is. The table shipped fairly quickly, it was packaged well and the price is very reasonable. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: The table took all of five minutes to assemble. As other reviews have indicated, it's very sturdy. What a terrific product for the price. It is precisely what I wanted...pretty, small, inexpensive, and well made. I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and am using them as coffee tables. I like them because they are light and look beautiful. The legs are kind of flimsy and wobbly so I hope they hold up to use since they are in a condo that gets rented out. I love how they look and how easy they are to move.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The table looks amazing. Took 5 min to put together. I've seen complaints about quality. My item didn't have any problems. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Legit took me 5 minutes to screw on the legs and BOOM it was ready
customer_reviews.author: Yachtze Luchin

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews have mentioned the metal does look a ...
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived very quickly and was packaged well. It took less than 10 minutes to put together. Like other reviews have mentioned the metal does look a little bit cheap but at a glance it's fine. Overall this table is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: There's 4 mounts on the glass, as soon as I tried to screw the 2 legs on, the mount comes apart off the glass taking a sharp/thin layer of glass with it. Shipping was fine, it's a product design flaw and defect.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: stunning, modern, and simple!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is absolutely gorgeous! Its suprisingly inexpensive and takes just 5 min. to setup. (just screw on the legs to the glass) It is very stable and looks fabulous with my grey shag rug, black leather rome sofa and white leather spinning loung chair. I would definately buy another one if the need arises! If your contemplating on buying this, you won't be dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you have a small space with low profile furniture, this table is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this table
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this table! Took 5 minutes to assemble and is very pretty! Matches my glass fireplace perfectly *which I also purchased through Amazon*. Looks great : )
customer_reviews.author: M Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece for a modern-themed living room
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table! It is the perfect piece for our modern-themed home. It took me less than 10 minutes to assemble everything! It was securely packaged and it arrived in perfect condition. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: maricarljanah

customer_reviews.title: This coffee table is perfect for me because it matches my end table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is perfect for me because it matches my end table. It has clean and nice look, not too haevy like my old one. It also very easy to put together also. I enjoy the simple clean look, and the size is not that big like most of the coffee table. The price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great little coffee table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little coffee table for the price! Super easy to install and very sturdy. Took me less than 3 minutes to put it together. Would definitely recommend this, especially for an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Leah G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table. On the small side but, for me that's good. Where you attach it together isn't the best fit so we have to tighten the bolt often. But, great value for the money. Would definitely, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a.

customer_reviews.title: Small and elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my little 545 square ft apartment. Looks incredibly elegant and seems to be very sturdy. You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The table was delivered on-time, in excellent condition and went together quickly. It is sturdy and well-made, and looks great in our game room, along with its cousin, the End table. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I am completely pleased with this table. It assembled easily, is sturdy and well finished and the smaller size is perfect for my needs. It is not a $300.00 table but it is a good honest table well worth the $100 it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Hudsonite

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Light
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Light, easy assembly and sides of tempered glass top are smooth with no cracks or sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and completely durable table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and completely durable table. Gets some water marks on it from cold drinks sometimes, but some water will clean it off. Great shipping and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very sexyand sturdy. Amazingly simple to put together. Makes the whole room come together. Just perfect! Can't beat this price
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little shaky but perfect as a beginning coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: apofan92

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: The 'dents' in the bottom corners mentioned in some reviews are actually very slight crimps done by the factory to assure the rubber feet don't fall out -- not noticeable once assembled and set up. The metal looks very good, not at all cheap or thin. The glass is quite thick, and (maybe this is usual) is also tempered. Looks great, is very sturdy, and small size is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: exsony

customer_reviews.title: Top pick
customer_reviews.text: This took less than 5 minutes for my boyfriend to assemble. I would have taken 15 max. It looks very expensive, and I could not ask for something nicer, especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four circular objects in the corner came broken / detached out of the box. I ended up gluing it back on myself and moving on because I don’t want to deal with the return process but I would not ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavy

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed legs but overall nice
customer_reviews.text: The legs of the coffee table came scuffed/dirty but I really like the overall look of the table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose N Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, modern, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Makes a small room look larger. Even a child could put it together yet well made and sturdy. Contemporary and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Could NOT be happier with this table
customer_reviews.text: Could NOT be happier with this table. So easy to put together, and looks quite posh. Absolutely wonderful for the price! No one would guess this was under 100.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Got this table for my master bedroom. Needed a small table for our sitting area and this is perfect. Easy to assemble and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee table, seems very sturdy, the glass is thick and really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful! It was super easy to assemble took 5 min! Also it looks great with my furniture! Great value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The item looks great and was very easy to assemble. The whole transaction was fast and easy. This table fits well with the rest of my modern style.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee my table ; Easy to assemble , sturdy & beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Toshianna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It looked just like the picture. Easy to assemble. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and didn't take us long to put them ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as what the picture shows. Great quality and didn't take us long to put them together. Serves the purpose for our small living room.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Rao

customer_reviews.title: Nice and elegant small table
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, good looking and very easy to assemble. Excellent value for its price. This is exactly what we needed after a more expensive and heavy coffee table crashed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rescigno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece of furniture easy to put together, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jjkool215

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! The table is very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! The table is very pretty. Very easy to install, is very compact inside the box they shipped. Not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Mariano

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: its very attractive, it was easy to put together, and it looks more expensive than it was. I am enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: momxyz

customer_reviews.title: COFFEE TABE FOR A KING
customer_reviews.text: This table is a perfect substitute for others sold in the $3-400 range. Need a very close look to see the quality is not the same but you almost cant tell the difference. Great looking and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Arpaia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Simple and functional. Easy to assemble. I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: J. Lab

customer_reviews.title: Very modern and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for our office sitting area. It's easy to assemble - took 5 minutes - and looks outstanding. Great coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Clean

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's apartment. For the price, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: kathty jw

customer_reviews.title: great table, great price
customer_reviews.text: it's a great little, modern looking table. I have it in my kitchen "cocktail lounge" area with a couple of much-more-expensive mid century chairs, and the table definitely holds it's own!
customer_reviews.author: B. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Solid, nice in my living room and really opens up the space... Excellent deal for the money.. definitely well made and solid/thick glass.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the living room or any room you wish.
customer_reviews.author: Shakthi Rajappa

customer_reviews.title: This is just so elegant for my space.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Elegant and fit well with my space. It is very sturdy and look expensive than it was. :)
customer_reviews.author: Celestina N

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine. It's what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine. It's what I expected, very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Attractive table, but gauge of metal for legs is thin. So far, has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tropp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Modern Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! Assembly was easy. It's modern, sturdy, and very easy to clean. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an relatively, affordable, modern, glass coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: R A Savage

customer_reviews.title: This is a smart table!
customer_reviews.text: I read other peoples reviews on this table before I bought it. The positive reviews were spot on. The table arrived in mint condition - so well packaged it took me 45 minutes to get it out of the box and 10 minutes to put it together! That's a switch - usually the other way around. It is a very smart table and the exact dimentions I needed. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: vanillahouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking small coffee table, simple but elegant. Very easy assembly (just 3 pieces!)
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Santa-Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic table at a fantastic price. Easy assembly, quick delivery. Exactly what I was looking for at a fraction of the price of higher-end retailers. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: it's the perfect size for a small living room. I love it, and I wish they made a longer one for a TV. I'm debating on getting an end table for my bed. the glass is very thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping247

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.text: SO much better than expected! -Delivery was SO fast: had the table at my door in 4 days. -Packaging was awesome, not a single dent, scratch, or scuff to be found -Assembly was as simple as could be, done in <30 minutes -Looks beautiful, is sturdy, and is exactly as I had imagined. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tnaluck

customer_reviews.title: ... quickly with no damages and the product was very nice for the amount paid for it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly with no damages and the product was very nice for the amount paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great Table !
customer_reviews.text: My table from Kings is beautiful. Packaging was superior. Put it together in 15 minutes. Looks great in my living room. Very pleased with this purchase. This replaced a beautiful tree trunk table which I gave to my daughter & her boyfriend. I went without a table for three years before deciding on mine. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ace7021

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful. It arrived on time. It was very easy to assemble and took me about 5 minutes, it is very sturdy and did I mention that it is beautiful?
customer_reviews.author: Áslaug E Grétarsdóttir

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern looking table looks perfect in my living room
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern looking table looks perfect in my living room. Although the glass is tempered, I am worried it may break if kids lean on it as it seem a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: Mami Sol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS COFFEE TABLE VERY VERY EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND IS VERY GREAT FOR THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: I received this table and was very pleased with the quality. It was very easy to put together. The glass is thick and very sturdy after assembly. I got exactly what I was hoping for. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table. I was impressed. Price is right. Seems reasonably solid. Easy to assemble. Shipped quickly. A little smaller than I expected (I didn't check dimensions before ordering) but I am overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing coffee table. One of the main fears I had when buying it is that something really heavy would land on it someday, and it would snap in two. However, after some initial stress testing, I found that the glass is very thick, very scratch-resistant, and incredibly easy to clean. All in all, this is a simple, minimalistic table that goes well with a low-height contemporary sofa.
customer_reviews.author: therealcheesecake

customer_reviews.title: EASY INSTALL SUPER FAB
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BEAUTIFUL TABLE...SUPER FAST SUPER EASY 5 MINUTE ASSEMBLY!!!! SERIOUSLY CUTE AND GREAT PRICE

customer_reviews.title: but this cocktail table is absolutely beautiful. I'm so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very hard to please, but this cocktail table is absolutely beautiful. I'm so happy with this purchase. I would recommend this to anyone. Great price, fancy look and all.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice small chrome cocktail table.
customer_reviews.text: Small and sleek. It fits in great with my decor.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, sturdy and looks far more expensive than the Amazon price.

customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table. I was worried at first that the chrome would be too shiny but it was not. I can say it look elegant and beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery and great quality product! And it's so simple to assemble! Even for me a small woman.

customer_reviews.title: I love the glass table
customer_reviews.text: The table is perfect. It's just the right size for the limited space. It looks contemporary and fits well with the black leather sectional and white/grey area rug. It was easy to put together. It arrived right on time. I was pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money. Take note of the dimensions, this table is small! Slightly smaller than I expected and quality is just okay, but overall I am satisfied.

product_meta.title: Kings Brand Furniture - Modern Chrome with Glass Top Cocktail Coffee Table
feature_bullets: Kings Brand Furniture - Modern Chrome With Glass Top Cocktail Coffee Table
The Bevan Cocktail Table features modern lines and a sleek glass top for an open and airy look.
Use as a coffee table to display books, photos, or ornaments.
Finish: Chrome. Material: Metal. Top: Clear Tempered Glass.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars197 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
